TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit BindingNavigator extends System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip implements class System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize
Public Class BindingNavigator Inherits ToolStrip Implements ISupportInitialize
type BindingNavigator = class inherit ToolStrip interface ISupportInitialize

summary.span: 表示窗体上绑定到数据的控件的导航和操作用户界面 (UI)。

span.span: Represents the navigation and manipulation user interface (UI) for controls on a form that are bound to data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件表示在窗体上导航和操作数据的标准化方法。The control represents a standardized way to navigate and manipulate data on a form. 在大多数情况下, 与控件配对, 可在窗体上移动数据记录并与它们进行交互。In most cases, a is paired with a control to move through data records on a form and interact with them. 在这些情况下, 属性设置为作为数据源的关联组件。In these cases, the property is set to the associated component that acts as a data source. 默认情况下, 控件的用户界面 (UI) 由一系列按钮、文本框和静态文本元素组成, 适用于最常见的数据相关操作, 例如添加数据、删除数据以及在数据中导航。By default, the control's user interface (UI) is composed of a series of buttons, text boxes, and static text elements for most common data-related actions, such as adding data, deleting data, and navigating through data. 每个控件都可以通过控件的关联成员来检索或设置。Each of these controls can be retrieved or set through an associated member of the control. 同样, 与类中的成员有一对一的对应关系, 它以编程方式执行相同的功能, 如下表所示。Likewise, there is also a one-to-one correspondence to members within the class that programmatically perform the same functionality, as shown in the following table. |UI 控件UI Control| 成员 member| 成员 member| |----------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| |**首先移动****Move First**||| |**移动上一个****Move Previous**||| |**当前位置****Current Position**||| |“计数”**Count**||| |**移到下一步****Move Next**||| |**上移****Move Last**||| |**添加新****Add New**||| |**删除****Delete**||| 向窗体添加控件并将其绑定到数据源(如)将自动在此表中建立关系。Adding a control to a form and binding it to a data source, such as a , will automatically establish the relationships in this table. 你可以使用以下技术之一自定义此工具栏:You can use one of the following techniques to customize this toolbar: - 使用构造函数创建, 该构造函数接受一个`addStandardItems`布尔型参数, 并将此参数设置为。 `false` Create the with the constructor, which accepts a Boolean `addStandardItems` parameter, and set this parameter to `false`. 然后, 将所需的对象添加到集合中。Then add the desired objects to the collection. - 如果需要大量自定义, 或将重用自定义设计, 请从派生一个类, 然后重写方法以定义其他或替换标准项。If a great deal of customization is desired, or the custom design will be reused, derive a class from and override the method to define additional or alternate standard items. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用控件在数据集中移动。The following code example demonstrates how to use a control to move through a data set. 集合包含在 中，后者使用 组件绑定到 控件。The set is contained in a , which is bound to a control with a component. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataNavigator#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataNavigator/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataNavigator#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataNavigator/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供此构造函数是为了方便, 它结合了创建新控件并将其添加到父级的步骤。This constructor is provided as a convenience, combining the steps of creating a new control and adding it to a parent . 与无参数构造函数一样, 它将属性`null`设置为, 并且不显示标准用户界面。Like the parameterless constructor, it sets the property to `null` and does not show the standard user interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数使用`BindingSource`参数来初始化属性。This constructor uses the `BindingSource` parameter to initialize the property. 它还添加了一组标准的导航按钮, 并设置了其相应的属性, 例如和。It also adds the standard set of navigational buttons and sets their corresponding properties, such as and .

summary.span: 获取或设置表示“新增”按钮的 。

span.span: Gets or sets the that represents the **Add New** button.

value.span: 表示的 "**添加新**" 按钮的。

span.span: A that represents the **Add New** button for the .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置后, 属性为 "**添加新**按钮" 生成事件处理程序。When set, the property generates the event handler for the **Add New** button. 当在运行时单击 "**添加新**" 按钮时, 此事件处理程序将调用方法。This event handler calls the method when the **Add New** button is clicked at run time. `null`如果之前未设置此属性, 则此属性为, 并且在隐式或显式调用方法之前对其进行访问。This property is `null` if it was not previously set and it is accessed before the method is implicitly or explicitly called. 如果 属性为`null`或属性为`false`, 则控件将禁用 "**添加新**按钮"。 The control will disable the **Add New** button if the property is `null` or the property is `false`. 在默认实现中, 此属性表示类型的控件。In the default implementation, this property represents a control of type .

summary.span: 将一组标准导航项添加到 控件。

span.span: Adds the standard set of navigation items to the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将标准的用户界面对象集添加到工具条, 以便进行基本的导航操作, 例如先移动、上移, 然后添加新的。 The method adds the standard set of user interface objects to the tool strip for basic navigation operations, such as **Move First**, **Move Last**, and **Add New**. 在派生类中重写, 以定义其他或其他工具条块项。Override in derived classes to define additional or alternative tool strip items. 若要确保对派生类的最佳设计时支持, 请确保每个项的属性中的值都有意义。To ensure optimal design-time support for your derived class, make sure each item has a meaningful value in its property. 在设计时, 这将用于为相应成员变量生成唯一名称。At design time, this will be used to generate a unique name for the corresponding member variable. 然后, 将更新项的属性, 使其与为成员变量指定的名称相匹配。The item's property will then be updated to match the name given to the member variable. > [!NOTE] > 此方法不会从中显式删除任何以前存在的项, 但会为、 、、、、 和设置新的值。 properties。This method does not explicitly remove any previously existing items from the , but does set new values for the , , , , , , and properties. 在添加项时, 还不会挂起布局。Also does not suspend layout while items are being added.

summary.span: 在初始化组件的过程中禁用对 的 控件的更新。

span.span: Disables updates to the controls of the during the component's initialization.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和方法允许控件优化对多个属性的更改。The and methods allow the control to optimize changes to multiple properties. 使用这对方法, 您可以在设计时初始化依赖属性或批处理设置多个属性。Using this pair of methods, you can initialize co-dependent properties or batch set multiple properties at design time. 调用方法以通知初始化正在启动的控件; 调用方法以通知初始化已完成。 Call the method to signal the control that initialization is starting; call the method to signal that initialization is complete.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性表示浏览的数据源。 The property represents the data source that the navigates through. 更具体地说, 的属性表示实际的数据列表。More specifically, the property of the represents the actual data list. 这是类的默认属性。This is the default property for the class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用控件在数据集中移动。The following code example demonstrates how to use a control to move through a data set. 集合包含在 中，后者使用 组件绑定到 控件。The set is contained in a , which is bound to a control with a component. 此代码示例摘自[了如何:使用 Windows 窗体 BindingNavigator 控件](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/move-through-a-dataset-with-wf-bindingnavigator-control.md)浏览数据集。This code example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Move Through a DataSet with the Windows Forms BindingNavigator Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/move-through-a-dataset-with-wf-bindingnavigator-control.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果设置此属性, 则此属性将为 "**删除**" 按钮生成事件处理程序。When set, this property generates the event handler for the **Delete** button. 当在运行时单击 "**删除**" 按钮时, 此事件处理程序将调用方法。This event handler calls the method when the **Delete** button is clicked at run time. `null`如果之前未设置此属性, 则此属性为, 并且在隐式或显式调用方法之前对其进行访问。This property is `null` if it was not previously set and it is accessed before the method is implicitly or explicitly called. `null` `false` 控件将在以下运行时情况下禁用 "删除" 按钮: 属性为, 属性为 0, 或者属性为。 The control will disable the **Delete** button under the following run-time circumstances: the property is `null`, the property is 0, or the property is `false`. 在默认实现中, 此属性表示类型的控件。In the default implementation, this property represents a control of type .

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

param.name: disposing
param.span: 表示释放托管资源和非托管资源； 表示仅释放非托管资源。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放由 占用的非托管资源，还可以另外再释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法由公共`Dispose`方法和方法调用。This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the method. `Dispose`调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`的方法, `disposing`并将参数`true`设置为。`Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 在`Dispose` 设置`disposing` 为`false`的情况调用。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 当参数为 true 时, 此方法释放该引用的任何托管对象所持有的所有资源。 `disposing`When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 当重写时, 请注意不要引用先前在调用时已释放的对象。

span.span: When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现的详细信息, 请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 有关 和的详细信息, 请参阅[清理非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[重写 Finalize 方法](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100))。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100)).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置后, 属性为 "移到**上一个**" 按钮生成事件处理程序。When set, the property generates the event handler for the **Move Previous** button. 当在运行时单击 "移到**上一个**" 按钮时, 此事件处理程序将调用方法。This event handler calls the method when the **Move Previous** button is clicked at run time. `null`如果之前未设置此属性, 则此属性为, 并且在隐式或显式调用方法之前对其进行访问。This property is `null` if it was not previously set and it is accessed before the method is implicitly or explicitly called. `null` 控件将在以下运行时情况下禁用 "移到上一项" 按钮: 属性为或属性小于或等于0。 The control will disable the **Move Previous** button under the following run-time circumstances: the property is `null` or the property is less than or equal to 0. 在默认实现中, 此属性表示类型的控件。In the default implementation, this property represents a control of type .

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnRefreshItems() cil managed
abstract member OnRefreshItems : unit -> unit override this.OnRefreshItems : unit -> unit

summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 除了引发相应的事件外 , 方法还针对关联的的状态执行以下操作。In addition to raising the corresponding event, the method performs the following operations against the state of the associated . - 设置使用当前状态的内部成员。Sets the internal members using the current state. - 启用或禁用针对当前状态适当的用户界面 (UI) 项。Enables or disables user interface (UI) items appropriately for the current state. - 更新和控件。Updates the and controls. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::ToolStripItem ^ PositionItem { System::Windows::Forms::ToolStripItem ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::ToolStripItem ^ value); };
member this.PositionItem : System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置 ，它显示 中的当前位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the that displays the current position within the .
The that displays the current position.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在默认实现中, 属性的类型为。In the default implementation, the property is of type . `null`如果之前未设置此属性, 则此属性为, 并且在隐式或显式调用方法之前对其进行访问。This property is `null` if it was not previously set and it is accessed before the method is implicitly or explicitly called. 通过获取的属性计算的当前位置, 并添加1以将该位置转换为基于1的计数。The current position calculated by obtaining the property of the , and adding 1 to transform the position into a 1-based count. 在默认实现中, 此属性表示类型的控件。In the default implementation, this property represents a control of type .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event RefreshItems As EventHandler

summary.span: 在需要刷新导航用户界面 (UI) 的状态以反映基础数据的当前状态时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the state of the navigational user interface (UI) needs to be refreshed to reflect the current state of the underlying data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件指示需要更新的导航 UI, 以反映关联的的当前状态。 The event signals that the navigational UI of the needs to be updated to reflect the current state of the associated . 这是 类的默认事件。This is the default event for the class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在此示例中, 事件处理程序报告事件的发生。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表可帮助你了解何时发生事件, 并可帮助你进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告多个事件或频繁发生的事件, 请考虑将消息替换为多行或将其追加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行示例代码, 请将其粘贴到包含名为 `BindingNavigator1`的类型的实例的项目中。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `BindingNavigator1`. 然后, 确保事件处理程序与事件相关联。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#124](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#124)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#124](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#124)]

summary.span: 刷新标准项的状态以反映数据的当前状态。

span.span: Refreshes the state of the standard items to reflect the current state of the data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在派生类中重写, 还应重写以刷新已添加到控件中的任何自定义标准项。If you have overridden in a derived class, you should also override to refresh any custom standard items you have added to the control.

summary.span: 导致进行窗体验证并返回指示验证是否成功的信息。

span.span: Causes form validation to occur and returns whether validation was successful.

returns.span: 如果验证成功并且焦点可移动到 上，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if validation was successful and focus can shift to the ; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法确认在对控件上的项执行 "单击" 操作之前焦点可以移位。Use this method to confirm focus can shift before performing the click action for an item on the control.
